snippet.title: Sunset Shift - Work driving a garbage truck on a private island!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://selkieharbour.itch.io/sunset-shift?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt You are going to be driving a garbage truck on a small island, to collect the trash produced by some vacational villas.

It doesn't matter if you don't have a license or any experience driving. It's a private island: traffic rules, along with many other rules, don't apply here.

The only thing that matters is that it's just a couple of hours a day, it pays A LOT, and you can enjoy yourself in one of the villas while you're not on the job.

➡️ More from Selkie Harbour https://selkieharbour.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More driving games https://itch.io/games/tag-driving?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
